sn34.28-34:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim vutthanakusalo hoti, na samadhismim kallitakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.5: samadhismim kallitakusalo hoti, na samadhismim vutthanakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.6: neva samadhismim vutthanakusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim kallitakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.7: samadhismim vutthanakusalo ca hoti samadhismim kallitakusalo ca.
sn34.28-34:1.11: (Purimamulakani viya yava catuttimsatima vutthanamulakasappayakarisutta satta suttani puretabbani.)
